column4: ok... so I have an ASUS A8V Deluxe with an AMD 64 3400+ and i can install ubuntu, but once it extracts all the packages (that part that takes forever...), it just hangs and reboots my computer right as it says it was loading Gnome... any ideas?? PLEASE HELP!
